website_summaries.verdict: This large-breed dog food is designed with the needs of big dogs in mind, and is made with quality natural ingredients. Ideal for dog owners who prefer to feed grain-free foods to their pets.
pros: A grain-free formula that's suitable for dogs with various health concerns such as allergies to grain or skin problems
100% natural with meat protein as the top ingredient
Omega fatty acids improve skin and coat, while glucosamine promotes joint health
cons: Some reports of dogs having diarrhea after eating it
Price falls on the higher end of the scale

website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for dog food for your huge dog that doesn't contain any artificial ingredients or grain, this is the one to get.
pros: A 100% natural recipe that doesn't contain grain, making it suitable for big dogs with certain dietary needs
Made with high-quality protein with chicken as the number-one ingredient
Great for numerous systems — contains probiotics, omega fatty acids, glucosamine, and antioxidants
cons: Priciest dog food on our short list
Won't work for dogs that shouldn't eat poultry
May cause diarrhea in some dogs

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong...
customer_reviews.text: My rottie has been on this food for about a year. When I first ordered from Amazon everything seemed fine, but over the past couple of months her stools have become softer and softer. So soft in fact, that she had to go to the emergency vet for an abscessed anal gland. I have no idea if it's the food but we recently started adding in another brand and her stools went back to normal. I don't trust this food any longer. Maybe it's Amazon. Maybe it's the food. I'm not sure but we'll be buying from the store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: J.Durant

customer_reviews.title: Wellness Core, great food, well tolerated by all the wagging tails.
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through many different Dry dog foods... and I am not a fan of any Dry dog food. But, they are easy. So, if I have to use one, I have tried many varieties. Blue Buffalo had a bad batch, and all my dogs had GI issues. I had problems with other brands, but never with Wellness. The dogs all love the taste. No GI problems with multiple dogs. And, I switch between the Wellness Core varieties without issues. Try this one for an alternative dry food. Like I said, no dry food, in my opinion is great. But, if you need to use one, I would try this variety.
customer_reviews.author: HomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog was on Purina ProPlan prior to Wellness Core. I bought a 12lb bag to mix with the ProPlan for an easy transition and I already see the difference. I know this sounds crazy but my dog used to eat dirt almost on a daily basis. I kept thinking she must be missing some sort of mineral in her diet. Since switching to Wellness Core she has stopped eating dirt. Not sure what it was but no longer an issue. We are not even out of the transition phase yet and I am already impressed. My dog loves it and has started to pick out the Wellness Core from the bowl and leave the ProPlan behind.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nonresealable bag makes it go stale quickly!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve fed Wellness Core for years. Very few issues with the food and our dogs seem to enjoy it when it’s fresh. My biggest complaint is they no longer make the bags resealable. The large bag lasts us about 3 weeks, in that time the food seems to go stale and then the dogs don’t want to eat it. One of our pups has allergies and we were told not to put it in a food storage container, but to leave it in the original bag. It’s more economical to buy the large bag, but it may go stale and be thrown before you can finish it, so choose the size carefully!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R

customer_reviews.title: Caused major diarrhea with my dog
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and within 2 days of opening it, my dog had massive diarrhea. $275 in vet bills with no concrete diagnosis, the vet recommended changing foods. Once I changed his food, diarrhea disappeared. I even contacted the company in case this was a bad batch and was given the "We will look into it" speech. For as much as I paid for this, I would expect a refund but no.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2thePookiesx3

customer_reviews.title: Digestive problems galore with this food four our dogs.
customer_reviews.text: We usually buy the whitefish food for our dogs, a yorkie and a lab... They both like the whitefish and never experience any digestive problems. Since we have had good luck with Wellness Core before, we thought that switching up the flavor might be a nice treat for the dogs but were we wrong. Both of the girls (neither of which have sensitive stomachs) were very uncomfortable on this particular food. We of course mixed the new food with the old to slowly introduce the new flavor but overall it was a bad experience for them. We are not sure if this was just a bad bag (which is possible) we may try again at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Was okay, be aware of expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: It was good at first, but the last bag I bought apparently went rancide. My dog stopped eating it completely about half way thru the bag, he was moapy and not wanting to do much, even on walks he was less active and coming home after two hour hikes not touching his food at all. Which has never been the case before. He refused to touch it for three days straight. He loved it at first, but buying thru Amazon apparently leaves the possibility of this product sitting too long on a shelf and going bad. So I am once again buying locally for my pet store & McGruff couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: worst diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: My lab has been eating Wellness for 3 months, but after getting the last bag he had terrible diarrhea for 4 days. I spent 2 nights waking up multiple times for him to go the bathroom with diarrhea. After a day of fasting and then giving him pumpkin and probiotics he has gotten better. After reading other review it seems like this a problem. So i highly recommend going with another option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with allergies!
customer_reviews.text: We have an older English bulldog who has suffered from serious allergy issues, swelling feet, uncontrollable anal gland issues,etc. We've tried several specialty and even prescription dog foods and nothing has worked as well as the Wellness Wild Game. We've been able to get him down to just seasonal shots and most of his allergy issues are under control!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wellness Core Natural Grain-Free Dry Dog Food, Large Breed
customer_reviews.text: Wellness Core Natural Grain-Free Dry Dog Food, Large Breed: Needed some dry dog food for treats, and most of the brands have gone to kibble that's too small for my purposes. My dog seems to like this, and it's large enough for me to pick up without needing a spoon. A bit pricey in a 12# bag, but it lasts about 8 months without getting rancid. Good list of ingredients. Even though my dog is a whippet mix, she's middle-aged, so the ingredients will support her health, even if this is just for treats.
customer_reviews.author: Zen Elder

customer_reviews.title: Consistent quality, healthy, dogs’ favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Great food. My dogs have eaten this brand for their whole lives and they are very healthy with very nice shiny fur (sign of healthy diet) This food has a higher protein content than the other high end dog food brands. This is my dogs’ favorite flavor of the dry dog food. I have ordered 4 years worth of this food and the quality has always been consistent and overall great.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Flavor choice makes my boy happy!
customer_reviews.text: Imagine eating the same food meal after meal day after day your entire life......BOOOORRRRRRIIIINNNG! Beyond the flavor\protein selection getting ti delivered to my door from the post man is crazy convenient. Our favorite dog food, this is what all the local ski resorts(Utah) feed their working avalanche dogs, its too rich for our old guy but we mix half and half with CostCo grain free dog food which he seems to love.
customer_reviews.author: Hikeswithdogs

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My elderly dog has been on this for a few years and still loves it. It keeps her regular, and I love that it's grain free, because that helps larger breeds and their joints. Her teeth aren't in the best shape, but she's able to eat this without any issues! Every bag I've ever had delivered over the last couple years has been in great shape, never expired. So glad this is available online!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie W.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Constipated and dog reeks after 2 weeks on this food
customer_reviews.text: I thought this food would be better than the blue buffalo I have been feeding my dog. I did a gradual transition which I thought went very well. Normally she transitions poorly and has diarrhea. Well it turns out this food is making her very constipated. And after being on it for almost 2 weeks her whole body stinks very strongly like dog food. She also has been a bit less energetic like she just isn't feeling so great. Going to throw the food away and switch back to blue buffalo wilderness.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lopez

customer_reviews.title: My do loves this food
customer_reviews.text: Great size kibble for my 70 lbs. goldendoodle. I researched foods, this was recommended for Goldendoodles. We switched him from the Merrick Puppy, acclimating him 3/4 to 1/4 first week, 1/2 to 1/2 second week, 1/4 to 3/4 third week and full conversion by the forth week. There was no soft stool and it was very easy to do. I love the subscribe and save feature--I will never have to do a last minute run to the pet store for food.
customer_reviews.author: Suki Doo

customer_reviews.title: Stomach problems
customer_reviews.text: I had just recently got a new puppy in the home, who was on another dog food and I assumed it was the normal food-switch diarrhea but after noticing my older dog who’s been on this food for months start to have it too, I knew it was the food. I read some prior reviews that confirmed what I knew. Disappointed as I was happy with the high-protein diet for my babes, back to nutro for us!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great Grain Free Food
customer_reviews.text: We have tried different Wellness foods to give our 'girls' some variety. This is another one that they love and do not react to. We solved their allergy problem by switching to this brand and both of us and our vet are amazed at the difference in our dogs. We do supplement this with fresh or frozen vegetables but they will still eat it plain. Very pleased again with this food and this 'flavor;
customer_reviews.author: Islandgal

customer_reviews.title: You can buy it for $10 less at the pet store
customer_reviews.text: My dogs both seem to like it. I bought them the raw one with flash frozen turkey this passed week. They do not like it as well. This is higher priced than the pet store but I suppose since I have it on the auto reship that the price will decrease over time and it’s convenient for me but my husband will buy it at the store every other time we need it so we save $10 vs this price. Ouch
customer_reviews.author: Candice Baker

customer_reviews.title: So many delivery problems with dogfood!
customer_reviews.text: The dog food amazing. Our purebred lab is incredibly healthy and handsome! But getting it delivered from amazon is THE WORST. We cant seem to rely on it actually getting here. Most of the time, it says it delivered and it isnt here. I dont know what is going on when it comes to dog food, perhaps because it is heavy? We dont usually have problems with anything else. Our advice, find another source, we definitely will.
customer_reviews.author: jason dunham

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Will Not Eat This Food
customer_reviews.text: My Dog will eat only a small amount of this food and has had diarrhea every since I bought it. Amazon or Wellness should have a guarantee on this food. I am stuck with a large bag of food that I can't feed my dog. It was quite expensive, also.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy D. Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients and good for those dogs with allergies to grains
customer_reviews.text: Quality ingredients and grain free. My pug and French Bulldog have been eating this dog food for several years now. Being the picky eaters they are when It comes to dog food, I usually add scrambled eggs or diced chicken, or a tiny bit of canned dog food as well.
customer_reviews.author: BonBoniru

customer_reviews.title: German Shepherd has been eating since off of puppy food, 5 years and no issues
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this, it has been my German Shepherd's food for 5 years now and she eats it (big deal with German shepherds as they are picky eaters), hasn't caused her problems, and is not on the list of grain free food problem foods. It is expensive, but since she is one of our 2nd round of kids, she is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: notsoNEWKINDLEUSER

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: I had been feeding Royal Canin, but my dog wouldn't stop eating sticks and pinecones. Vet recommended switching food to something with more protein so I am trying the Wellness. In less than a week, he's cut way back on his stick and pinecone intake.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Howard

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cats started on Core and when I got a dog I started her on it as well. She is trim and has a healthy coat. I feel confident in the ingredients I’m feeding her. She doesn’t quite love the taste as much as some others, but she does look forward to eating.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: has been the best. My Yorkie loves it and looks forward to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for quality dog food for many years, partly because I want my pet to be healthy but partly because my little Yorkie is a very picky eater. I ran across a recommendation to use the Wellness CORE brand on a site dedicated to healthy pets. This particular variety, Wild Game, has been the best. My Yorkie loves it and looks forward to every meal. He also seems to have less weeping from his eys and more energy. I just set up a Dash button so that I can order another bag every time his is running low.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGuy

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best Dog Food on the market
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love this! They were eating another known brand that is sold in stores (and recently came to light that it contained potentially deadly chemicals) and they were ran down, the light in their eyes were disappearing... along with their energy. It got to the point where they completely refused to eat it, so we fed them regular food (which we do anyway). After switching to this brand the difference in both their eyes, energy and weight have been significant. They go through this with an absolute hunger and they might even love this stuff. It is all natural. What's not to love!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bain

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food, he gobbles it up.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has limited ingredients. My dog likes it, and to make it interesting I mix it with another brands food so my dog doesn’t get bored. No intestinal issues either. The pieces are a bit larger than other brands I’ve tried. My small dog can handle it, you just have to be aware of portion control.
customer_reviews.author: PeteNY

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for your fur pet.
customer_reviews.text: I've used wellness for many years, quality ingredients for a healthy dog. I switch brands occasionally to vary their diet but wellness is a staple. Dogs love all but the white fish flavor, the kibble is a bit hard especially for my older one that's missing a few teeth. Their favorite is the small breed formula, I have chis and a terror mix.
customer_reviews.author: KofC

customer_reviews.title: The quality is second to none for the price point and both dogs love it and are doing very well on it
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying this food at Petco for a couple years and didn't even realize it was on here until recently. The amazon price is a few dollars lower than Petco and with subscribe and save it is even cheaper! The quality is second to none for the price point and both dogs love it and are doing very well on it. You do run the risk of getting old food whenever ordering from warehouse suppliers like amazon, but it seems like they move this fast enough that it isn't a problem anymore like some of the reviews have complained about. All of the food I have gotten has been fresh and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: C. Juber

customer_reviews.title: I was buying the core large breed dog food in ...
customer_reviews.text: I was buying the core large breed dog food in the stores. I checked out amazon and found that they had it. When I buy this in the stores the kibble is large because it is for large dogs. THe wellness website even says large bits for larger mouth dogs. However, when I ordered this from Amazon the kibble was small in size. It makes me worried that it is not a true manufacture product. My dog didn't have any problems but I am not sure I will buy this from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Vutorious

customer_reviews.title: great for my dog
customer_reviews.text: only kibble food we have found that my dog can eat regularly without outbreaks - she has severe allergies that she takes medication for- we have had her blood work done for both food and environmental - she is allergic to almost everything on the planet - we have had her on a strict diet which includes this food - with her diet and meds she is doing great - thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food and I love the quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food and I love the quality of the product. I order two bags every month. The only issue I have with my order is that one bag was delivered to my house, just as it usually is, and the other bag was delivered to the post office where I had to wrestle the huge box out the door and across the parking lot to my car. If the food is going to be delivered to the post office in the future, I will have to cancel my order as I cannot carry a box that heavy.
customer_reviews.author: speersj

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY Recommend Wellness Core!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Wellness Core dog food. After we discovered our shepherd mix was diabetic (after eating Beneful Healthy Weight for years), I began researching dog food. The Wellness Ocean (along with insulin) leveled his blood sugar and gave him so much energy. We have 3 dogs and give all of them Wellness. Their coats are shiny and full of energy. After our diabetic dog died we switched to the large breed since it seems they get a little more quantity with the bigger kibbles. It does give our young boxer/pit BAD gas. But he doesn't seem to be uncomfortable (although everyone around him is).
customer_reviews.author: Lou A Kee

customer_reviews.title: My dog approves...
customer_reviews.text: I feed this to my Pom mix as I really trust the Wellness brand. I prefer the Core mix with higher protein -- he seems to have more energy when I feed him this. The Wild Game Formula is his preferred flavor -- he likes it more than the Original flavor or the fish based option, which he's also tried. I also feed him soft food (either the Wellness Core canned food or homemade food) in addition to this and add in a small amount of pumpkin puree to it. If he eats only this kibble with no soft food, his stools tend to be excessively dry -- which isn't surprising given the higher protein content.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Top quality dog food.
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves this food and gets angry if he doesn't have it. This is top quality dog food. It is a bit pricey but well worth the money to have a happy healthy dog. It may sound gross but the dog has solid poop with this food which makes for easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S. Manookin

customer_reviews.title: No hormones
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua loves this food and I feel good about what I’m giving her. Most ingredients have hormones and that’s why I chose wild game. She’s been eating this for about six months and we haven’t had any upset stomachs. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good food but not good enough for our dog
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loved this food. He loved it so much that he would eat it so fast and make himself sick. We switched him to the Wellness from Iams because his stools weren’t as formed as they should be. After about two months of using Wellness his stools still weren’t adequate so we switched him to Blue Buffalo. He doesn’t eat it as fast as the Wellness so he doesn’t get as sick anymore, and his stools are a lot better!
customer_reviews.author: shennah

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it - exactly the same as pet store - have been a repeat customer.  Read review for more details...
customer_reviews.text: This is the food we had been buying at the local big box pet store, but even with coupons, Amazon pricing is cheaper. I was nervous though --- would the food still be fresh? Would it smell foul or be spoiled from sitting in a hot warehouse? Would it be nearer expiration? Would my dogs know the difference (one is a picky eater!)? Well - we have had zero issues! I've ordered it multiple times from Amazon Prime and Amazon Now, and no issues :) My dogs LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: NomadicShopperTX

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a very fine food. My dog
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a very fine food. My dog, a yellow Labrador, has had a very healthy coat and digestive process since we began using it. I was transitioning from ProPlan to Core. When I transitioned over to Core, she did not like it as much as ProPlan but now she is eating all her food. I will probably continue using it, because I think it is a superior product, but I may mix it with ProPlan to keep my Lab happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 'Chicken Free' Grain Free Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: After lots of trial and error with many other brand name grain free dog foods, Wellness Core's Wild Game formula is the only food I've been able to find that doesn't contain chicken orany chicken by products that also doesn't cost a small fortune. I feed this daily to both of my dogs and I've noticed a huge difference in the softness and shininess of their coats, and all of the skin related allergy symptoms that were affecting one of my dogs have gone away completely! Highly recommend this food!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our huge puppy
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't find a grain free puppy large breed food with a good rating on dog food advisor (the authority on dog food quality!) and we have been fans of Wellness for quite some time. After comparing nutrition, we decided this would best suit our 6 month old large breed puppy and also solve his food sensitivity which caused diarrhea. Buying a Large Breed food is important so they don't grow too fast- which can cause all sorts of joint issues later in life.
customer_reviews.author: Possum QueenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Picky dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was always very picky about her food. She loves this flavor and being able to buy in a bulk size is much more cost effective. I've been ordering this for months and don't plan to stop!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricy but it's made with premium ingredients, my dog loves it (more than any other food he's tried) and its healthy for him. So I'm definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stehr

customer_reviews.title: Love the CORE series already- great addition to rotation
customer_reviews.text: My dog has colitis so Grain Free with variety of proteins is important to me since there is a great deal of concern with her developing a protein allergy. Both my small dogs (7lb and 25lb) love the Wild Game Formula. I rotate between different bags of food from different brands and protein sources but Wellness CORE is always in the weekly rotation. Seems to be easily digestible, no gas and solid stools. The dogs love the taste and its fun for them to have different flavor variety.
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: Good nutrition plus ended ear yeast infections!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old lab that has had chronic ear yeast infections his entire life that no amount of vet medicine have managed. I've been trying grain free dog foods for several months after reading several other comments about the relationship between gluten and auto immune disorders, and seen some, but not major, improvement. Now, about a month after putting him on this food, his ears are totally clear for the first time I can remember.
customer_reviews.author: STL Carol

customer_reviews.title: Her coat is silky soft and shines beautifully. I have had several people at the dog ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old Golden Retriever has been on Wellness Core chow for almost her entire life and she remains healthy as a horse! Her coat is silky soft and shines beautifully. I have had several people at the dog park comment on her coat and ask what food she eats. I recently switched to this flavor from the one with chicken and my pup loves it! I did a mixture of the two flavors to prevent diarrhea during the switch and the darn dog would spit out every tiny piece of the chicken food for this Wild Game flavor! It is pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: MoeKnows

customer_reviews.title: Jack Russell likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russell likes it! It's funny watching her get excited about breakfast and dinner! When she sees my husband open the food pail with Wellness Core she jumps up and down like she has springs in her legs! Guess we'll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: The brand Wellness CORE is a great brand for dogs with colic and upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: The brand Wellness CORE is a great brand for dogs with colic and upset stomach. Our pup does not tolerate grain amongst many other things. When he ate regular dog food, he passed a lot of gas and threw up frequently. Since we started him on Wellness CORE, he tolerates it much better. We are now a gas free house - JK but it's been much better!
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES this food!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY dog my eat without putting anything extra in her food! It’s a little costly but it’s worth it because she no longer wastes food. Every piece of kibble is GONE! My fur baby is very picky and has a very sensitive stomach. But this food is perfect and a godsend! The search for the perfect kibble is over!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food so far, alittle expensive for a small bag, but worth it for the fact of knowing she is getting quality food.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda

customer_reviews.title: Buy in store only!
customer_reviews.text: Ryder loves his food but this batch he has been puking and gagging. It does not smell the same as when we get it in the store. He’s now vomited three times and he just came back with a clean vet bill just days before this batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves taste of rabbit, I got this bag as a trial bag, and she has been loving it so I need to get her a bigger bag.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: the only food i'll buy
customer_reviews.text: this is the only food i'll buy for my toy poodle. he loves it, and when we can't find it in stores, we order the biggest bag amazon offers. keeps him fed and happy, and i've never had problems with freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Tea Burdine

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be one of the healthiest dog food options, and doesn't upset their stomachs. They love eating it. We switched to this from a chicken flavor because of one of my dogs seems sensitive to chicken, and this has had better results.
customer_reviews.author: Ster

customer_reviews.title: Murphy likes it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t taste it, but the dog likes it! 😂 Very expensive though compared to other similar foods. The positive though is he fills up quicker so the food doesn’t run out quickly. It’s more of a meal than a big bowl of sghetti!!
customer_reviews.author: James Broome

customer_reviews.title: my dog use to do good on this food
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this dog food for my lab mix for about 7 years now and it was great but I don’t know if they changed something but now my dogs stools are soft and runny. The last bag he had extreme diarrhea so I took him to vet. Put him on a homemade bland diet and his stools became normal. Just bought another bag of this and his stools are again really soft. I will not be buying this food again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl LaRoche

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR DOG FOOD
customer_reviews.text: SUPERIOR DOG FOOD!! This brand is a very high end product and the QUALItY is second to none (although BLUE may come a close second). I have a border collie and lab - very high energy dogs. They LOVE meal time and as a dog-parent, I want to ensure they will stay fit and healthy with their diet. This is the only dry dog food that does not repulse me when I open the bag. Very, very pleased with this product and would HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: April Showers

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky dogs
customer_reviews.text: Our husky is a very picky eater! She loves this dry food. In fact it’s really the only dry food we can get her to eat. Even better is the fact that it’s a healthy product. We always buy from Amazon because it is less expensive here than the local pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Low odor, been feeding my dogs wellness for over 20 years
customer_reviews.author: S. Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: Great top quality food for your big baby
customer_reviews.text: I feed my 75 pound Alapaha Blue Blood bulldog this and he loves it. My vet recommended it cause he said since it is formulated for large breeds it can help prevent hip dysplasia or at least the severity of it. It's grain free and his coat is gorgeous and very shiny. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: J. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: We free feed our dogs and before we switched to this blend it was just fine. But we we did not see that you are supposed to feed half as much of this blend. Needless to say our dogs put on a touch of weight as they ate a little more which really meant they ate twice as much in reality. For free feeding this may not be the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nisson

customer_reviews.title: My dogs seems to like the taste
customer_reviews.text: My dogs (6 & 7 yrs old) seems to like this, this is good cause my 7 yrs old is quite picky on food. However, I do notice that their stool has became very soft since which is not a good sign. I do give them time to adapt new food but It's been about a month now and no improvement at all. I have no choice but to change to other brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Checkque

customer_reviews.title: Not sure? Just look at the ingredients
customer_reviews.text: this food is great! Not corn-based as I realized most dog foods are after struggling with, and chasing my golden retriever to treat hot spots and yucky ears. They always turned into infection. And a few visits to the vet, antibiotics, etc. After doing some research I came across info on canine diets and compared the ingredient lists of different dog foods. Wellness core had the cleanest and the meat base I was looking for. After switching foods there was immediate improvement. And to this day no hot spots! I am still amazed and wish I would have converted my dog sooner. I'm a fan and will recommend to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: We knew the Wellness dry food was good when our older dog ate it without having to ...
customer_reviews.text: We knew the Wellness dry food was good when our older dog ate it without having to mix in a Wellness can food. Both our dogs eat the dry food in the morning and look forward to mixing the Wellness dry and can food for their evening meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm SO glad I automated my dog food
customer_reviews.text: I'm SO glad I automated my dog food! As much as I love wandering the pet store, this specific flavor was getting taken off shelves at multiple stores near me, this saved me from switching foods or starting flavor expirements all over again with two finnicky dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I feel good about the high price, knowing my dog is receiving what is best for her.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great brand of dog food, my dogs love it, high in protein. Price is high for a quality but my dogs are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dona

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My Husky/Akita loves it. It's somewhat small for her, but it's crunchy and doesn't gunk up her teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Zarate Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Bella loves this food
customer_reviews.text: Wellness is the only food my pit can eat without getting an upset tummy
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Gleaves

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product, needs mixed with wet to eat.
customer_reviews.text: No nasty side effects I can notice. Kind of pricey imo. 4-solid stars
customer_reviews.author: Smile,Happiness & Love

customer_reviews.title: This is premier dog food
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research for food for our dogs especially our German Shepard. This food is awesome as it was recommended by trainers and also our vets. Also our dog loved it, and has exactly all the nutritional value she needs
customer_reviews.author: Lenix

customer_reviews.title: Amazon and wellness perfect together
customer_reviews.text: Product seems like a winner when grouped with amazon prime which is simply amazing pretty much gets here in less then a day
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested, dog approved
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since my little homeboy liked a food so much that he would sit by his bowl and look forlorn, but this was the one that did it. Great nutrition and he loves it. On our second bag so far and it seems to be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: I treat and respect my dog Marley with love and what I feed her is a reflection of
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find quality dog food. I am happy with this food. I treat and respect my dog Marley with love and what I feed her is a reflection of myself
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Braun

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My dog, a blue heeler, loves this food and shows no allergic reaction or vomiting as she did with many other foods. Well worth the money to keep her healthy. Her poop is always healthy and she always finishes her bowl which also hasn't been the case with many other foods.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Trembacz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend Wellness CORE Wild Game Formula Dry Dog food
customer_reviews.text: As with all Wellness products this is human-grade food balanced for dogs. Grain free CORE is a high quality food that my dog thrives on. With this product you get what you pay for, I believe my dog is healthier- and I have less Veterinarian bills because of the quality foods she eats. Highly recommend Wellness CORE Wild Game Formula Dry Dog food.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Our bull dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried all the flavors of core wellness and wild game is our OEB’s favorite
customer_reviews.author: Kate Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food! My dog seems to like it and he is doing really well with it. I pair it with a bit of the core chunky centers or hearty cuts and he really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: VjpTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I can't buy this anymore, because we found out our dog is allergic to some of the ingredients. But he loves this kibble and never got bored with the flavor like he did with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: My dogs enjoyed this as a little addition to break the monotony ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs enjoyed this as a little addition to break the monotony of their Wellness Simple lamb dog food. They have sensitive skin and this Core wild grain did not cause them to itch and made them more eager to eat their "usual" dog food. Recommend this and have tried several Wellness dry foods with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Best brand ever!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff. They look healthier, are more active and coats look great! It's been months since I started to feed this type from the brand and they still love it. Usually they get bored and i have to switch flavors not with this one.
customer_reviews.author: c.moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great brand.
customer_reviews.text: It itched my dog ​​and throws a lot of hair, I thought that this food would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Mejias

customer_reviews.title: Great food; great price
customer_reviews.text: I always try to get the best dry food that I can for my dog. This food had gotten a high rating amongst the many varieties of dry food, so we decided to try it. My black Lab has become very picky about her dry food, and so far this is the only one that she hasn't snubbed. I love even more that ordering from Amazon Prime usually saves me about $25 off of pet store prices!
customer_reviews.author: Berdie K.

customer_reviews.title: Order It Every Month
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. I have an automatic feeder and she used to watch me eat even when her feeder when off now she leaves me and heads to the feeder no matter what I'm eating! I guess she likes this better then my food. I've feed her a few different types of this brand but she likes this one the best. And the pieces of food are a good size for a small dog too.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Doggie heaven in a 26 lb bag!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old lab/beagle mix absolutely loves this stuff! We mix a few spoonfuls of the wellness core wet food in the morning to increase her calories since she is so active. Everyone comments on her shiny coat, which has been noticeably improved since I switched her from Taste of the Wild, which is also a good brand, but this stuff is just a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: J.J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food ever!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!!!! My dog had it for the first time last night. She is in love with it. so far it seems to have satisfied her. I love how there are no grains/gluten in the food. She has allergies that were flairing up badly, so far today not as bad. So I am hoping this will help her skin also.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: At $50-something (free shipping) - this is a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Switched one of my dogs (with allergies) over to the Wild Game Formula from Blue Buffalo Ocean blend. Just had an allergy screen run on him due to his constant scratching and runny eye. While the allergy screen didn't show a food allergy (come to find out it is very rare for a dog to have one - only 5% of allergy cases), I do like the fact that the ingredients list doesn't include chicken meal like Blue Buffalo has, even in the Wilderness brands.
customer_reviews.author: BHO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but better options out there for less
customer_reviews.text: Good food but better options out there for less money. Switched to taste of the wild and i think my dogs coat, bowel movements, and energy levels all seems better.
customer_reviews.author: 6ohFordguy

customer_reviews.title: I took this as a substitute till I can find one I thought he may like. Turns out he loves it
customer_reviews.text: I had my dog on wellness core before but with a different protein. It was a brown and tan bag. He ate it moderately. When I was changing his food. I took this as a substitute till I can find one I thought he may like. Turns out he loves it. He eats it right away! Now gonna get the bigger size for my 36 lb
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Really great I have had my dog on wellness for 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great I have had my dog on wellness for 6 years and I mix this 4 lb bag into a 15 lb bag of wellness healthy weight. She loves the mix. Package came in good condition experiation date is 2018. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, grain free kibble even picky dogs enjoy
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very picky about kibble but she loves the Wellness Core Wild Game formula. When we first got her, we tried a bunch of different kibble (including the regular line of Wellness) and she just wasn't that into anything. We had to hide it under tons of other stuff and it was not practical. Then we tried this one and it was the first kibble she would eat by itself! I love that its a healthy, grain free food that she enjoys. Its been about 6 months since she started eating it and she's still loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Erica M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have celiacs, so this food helps me stay away from cross contamination. I love the quality of this food. My dog's coats have never looked so healthy. Be very careful with the amounts that you feed of this food, because it is higher in calories that many other dog foods. Wellness provides calorie counts for their foods, so I would look that up on the website and give your dogs just as much as they need.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Did my research and this product used to be top tier. I’ve been seeing a lot of reports coming in and the recipe may have changed. Also the price has gone up 20% in the last year. I’ll be switching before next order of subscribe and save
customer_reviews.author: Dallas O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it's grain free, and an added bonus is that you can switch between flavors without an adjustment period like other brands. If my dog gets bored of one flavor I can immediately switch to another, which is really convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great product but WTF about the price changes???
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased w/ the quality of the product, but NOT the price! When I first purchased this, it was listed at about$48. Every time since, it has been $64. WTF??? Not happy that the price jumped up & stayed there.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A product that really can help an dog .
customer_reviews.text: Great product it has really help my 17 year dog to gain weight & she no longer throwing up . Thank you Susie
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not delivered
customer_reviews.text: i got a text, email and amazon says it was delivered today and left in mailbox..... There is no number for me to call and this was NOT delivered Also, it is a 26 pound bag, this would not fit in my mailbox. Ive been on auto ship for a while now with this, and there has been no problem till today, Who do i call? I need my dogs food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Would Not Eat It.
customer_reviews.text: I bought because it would be great to have my dogs food delivered. The other plus was it was very healthy. But the dogs did not like it at all. I ended up throwing it out which was a waste of money. But after 2 days in their bowels they would not eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Vanak Strelec

customer_reviews.title: This is the only food my 8yo lab can eat ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food my 8yo lab can eat he's allergic to all grains. He's been on this for 2 years and no more constant licking and itching his feet! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sassa

customer_reviews.title: love the high quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the only dog foods my dog will eat right away if it's put in front of her. other foods she turned her nose up at. love the high quality ingredients, and it doesn't cause her any GI distress.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hirsh

product_meta.title: Wellness Core Natural Grain Free Dry Dog Food Large Breed
product_meta.description: Size:26 lbWellness CORE Natural Grain Free Dry Dog Food Large Breed Health Chicken & Turkey Recipe is healthy, 100 percent natural grain free dog food for adult large breed dogs made with chicken, turkey, fruits and vegetables to help support your dog's optimal health, featuring larger kibble size for large breed dogs and fortified with antioxidents, probiotics, vitamins and minerals, including fish and flax omega blend for healthy skin and coat and higher levels of protein, glucosamine and chondroitin that large breed dogs need. Wellness CORE grain free dog food formulas are based on the nutritional philosophy that dogs thrive on a diet mainly comprised of meat. Each grain free, nutrient rich formula provides high quality protein for your dog with no meat by products or fillers, grain, corn, soy, wheat gluten or artificial preservatives, colors or flavors.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED NATURAL NUTRITION TO FUEL YOUR LARGE BREED DOG'S BEST LIFE: Premium protein expertly balanced with nutrient rich superfoods for a complete and balanced dog food, with guaranteed levels of the nutrients your large breed dog needs to thrive
SAVORY FOOD DOGS LOVE: Wellness CORE is available in grain and grain free recipes, as well as limited ingredient diets for dogs with food sensitivities
LEANER BODY MASS AND MUSCLE TONE: Wellness CORE dog food is made with a high concentration of protein from fresh meat ingredients
SUPPORTS HEALTHY SKIN AND COAT with guaranteed levels of omega fatty acids from ingredients such as flaxseed and salmon oil
WHOLE BODY HEALTH: Supported by omega fatty acids, antioxidants, glucosamine, probiotics and taurine for a healthy heart

Made in the USA using only the finest globally sourced ingredients, we prepare each of our diets in our own state of the art facility; we craft delicious natural recipes with wholesome, non GMO ingredients chosen for their nutritional benefits

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
